Package cz.ziki.had.pawn.food

Interface Food

All Superinterfaces:
GameObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
Apple, Lizard, Mouse
public interface Food extends GameObject
Interface representing a food object in the game.

  • Method Details

    • loadImage

      void loadImage()
      Loads the image associated with the food object.

    • spawn

      void spawn()
      Spawns the food on the game field at a specific or random position.

    • update

      void update(double dt)
      Updates the state of the food object. This method is typically called every game tick to allow the food to interact with the game world.
      Specified by:
      update in interface GameObject
      Parameters:
      dt - the time delta, used for time-based updates

    • draw

      void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws the food object on the game field.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface GameObject
      Parameters:
      g2 - the Graphics2D object used for rendering the food image

    • isSpawned

      boolean isSpawned()
      Checks if the food object has been spawned on the game field.
      Returns:
      true if the food has been spawned, false otherwise
